  • Method Details

    • remarkTransientFields

      public static void remarkTransientFields(Class<?> targetClass)
      Mark all transient fields in targetClass as @Transient for the XML serialization. Fields marked with java transient keyword do not work because the XMLEncoder does not take these into account. This helper marks the fields marked with transient keyword as transient also for the XMLDecoder.
      Parameters:
      targetClass - the class

    • setFieldValue

      public static void setFieldValue(Object obj, String fieldName, String value) throws IOException
      Invokes a setter on an object and passes a value to that setter. The value is passed as string and the function will automatically try to convert it to the parameter type in the setter. These conversion are available only for java primitive datatypes:
      • Boolean or boolean
      • Short or short
      • Integer or integer
      • Long or long
      • Float or float
      • Double or double
      • Byte or byte
      • Character or char
      • String
      Any other parameter type will cause an exception. The size/value itself is checked elsewhere.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object
      fieldName - name of the field which will be changed
      value - desired value represented as string
      Throws:
      IOException - if any error occurs (no suitable method, bad conversion, ...)

    • setFieldValue

      public static void setFieldValue(Object obj, String fieldName, Object value) throws IOException
      Invokes a setter on an object and passes a value to that setter.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object
      fieldName - name of the field which will be changed
      value - desired value
      Throws:
      IOException - all exceptions from the reflection

    • hasField

      public static boolean hasField(Object obj, String fieldName)
      Parameters:
      obj - object
      fieldName - field name
      Returns:
      true if field is present in the object (not recursively) or false

    • getFieldValue

      public static Object getFieldValue(Object obj, String field) throws IOException
      Invokes a getter of a property on an object.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object
      field - string with field name
      Returns:
      string representation of the field value
      Throws:
      IOException - exception
